title: Easy way out
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Alcohol
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Youth - Alcohol use
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Drugs
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Youth - Drug use
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Health education
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Adolescent psychology
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Teenagers
description: Demonstrates the need for a constructive approach to drugs and alcohol. Through a novel analogy between the physical effort needed by chicks to hatch from eggs and the psychological effort needed by adolescents to mature, the viewer learns that struggle develops strength.
